trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies scope of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*> as a page, document, or sequence of documents.
trans-unit.target: Valore di enumerazione che specifica l'ambito del <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>come una pagina, un documento o una sequenza di documenti.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: Based on the scope of defined by `printTicketLevel`, the number of pages or the number of documents associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: In base all'ambito di definito da `printTicketLevel`, il numero di pagine o il numero di documenti associati <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore predefinito di impostazioni della stampante da utilizzare durante la stampa del documento.

trans-unit.source: Setting the CurrentPrintTicket property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione della proprietà CurrentPrintTicket convalida né modifica specificata <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specifico <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>valido per una determinata stampante.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: Le impostazioni predefinite della stampante da utilizzare durante la stampa del documento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica l'ambito del <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: When the CurrentPrintTicketLevel property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando la proprietà CurrentPrintTicketLevel è <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>proprietà specifica il numero di output di documenti con <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>

trans-unit.source: For other CurrentPrintTicketLevel values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per altri valori CurrentPrintTicketLevel, la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>proprietà specifica il numero di output di pagine con <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref> event as for a sequence of documents, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: Un'enumerazione che indica l'ambito del <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"> </xref> evento di una sequenza di documenti, un singolo documento o una singola pagina.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di documenti o le pagine di output con <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the Sequence property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>proprietà è <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, la sequenza specifica il numero di output di documenti con <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the Sequence property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per altri <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>che valori, la sequenza specifica il numero di pagine di output con <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di documenti o pagine di output con <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>
